title: How to Find Your Mentions on Twitter

steps.title: Go to X.
steps.content: Go to X. Go to twitter.com in your web browser and log in with your account.

steps.title: Open your notification tab.
steps.content: Open your notification tab. Click on the Notifications from the top bar.

steps.title: Navigate to "Mentions".
steps.content: Navigate to "Mentions". Click on the Mentions, near the "All".

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Scroll down to view more mentions.

steps.title: Go to X and log in with your account.
steps.content: Go to X and log in with your account. If you are already signed into your account, skip this step.

steps.title: Move to the search bar.
steps.content: Move to the search bar. Search for your @username . E.g: @wikiHow

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Now you can see the all the Tweets which you are mentioned in.
